Post._content:
## Before We Start


 MTG 
 500 


<!--more-->

 Pro Tour
 Combo +  Pioneer Challenger 

...... Winota ban 
 ban  MITQ 
...... win-in 
 MITQ

 MITQ 

 MITQ 

 2X 

## Decklist


4x Bloodtithe Harvister
//
4x Bonecrusher Giant
 Shock 
4x Fatal Push

4x Thoughtseize

4x Fable of the Mirror-Breaker
 win con 
25x ~ 26x Lands



1x Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger

1x Misery's Shadow

2x Graveyard Trespasser

2x Sheoldread, the Apocalypse + 2x Archfiend of the Dross
 4 drop  Archfiend of the Dross  deck Sheoldread  Sheoldread 
> Edit(July 12, 2023):
>  3x Sheoldread, the Apocalypse + 1x Kalitas, Traitor of Ghet
>  convoke  Archfiend of the Dross  convoke  Archfiend of the Dross  Power Word Kill  Heartless Act Kalitas  or  Heartless Act 
> 


4x 2 drop Instant Speed Removal Spell

1x Liliana of the Veil
 top deck  +1 
2x Reckoner Bankbuster


 PT  26  & Misplacedginger  25  Misplacedginger 

4x Blood Crypt
4x Haunted Ridge

2x Blackcleave Cliffs + 2x Blightstep Pathway + 1x Sulfurous Springs
 Blackcleave Cliffs  Sheoldread  Sulfurous Springs 
1x Den of the Bugbear + 2x Hive of the Eye Tyrant + 1x Mutavault
 2x Den of the Bugbear + 2x Hive of the Eye Tyrant Den of the Bugbear  Hive of the Eye Tyrant  Hive of the Eye Tyrant  Mutavalut
1x Takenuma + 1x Sokenzan

1x Urborg + 2x Castle Locthwain

3x Swamp
 2x Swamp + 1x Mountain


2x Duress
 Duress Duress  + 
1x Reckoner Bankbuster

1x Rending Volley + 1x Noxious Grasp
 1x Rending Volley + 2x Noxious Grasp 
1 The Meathook Massacre + 3x Extinction Event

2x Invoke Despair

1x Hidetsugu Consumes All
 HCA  token 
1x Kolaghan's Command

2x Go Blank


 Go Blank

[](https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/5713356#paper)

{% asset_img Rakdos_Midrange-min.jpg "" %}

## Starting Hands, Countermeasures and Mulligan


2~3x Lands 
0~2x 1 drop 
1~3x 2 drop 
0~1x 3+ drop 
 1 drop  2 drop 


2x Lands
1x Thoughtseize
1x Fable of the Mirror-Breaker
1x Power Word Kill
1x Reckoner Bankbuster
1x Random Card



3x Lands
1x Thoughtseize
1x Bloodtithe Harvester
1x Bonecrusher Giant
1x Fable of the Mirrir-Breaker
 Fable of the Mirror-Breaker  Bonecrusher Giant  2/2

1x Bonecrusher Giant

 decktech
cEDH Esper Farm & Tivit Midrange cEDH  cEDH  meta 
Izzet Murktide & Rakdos ScamMurktide  8000+  Scam

> 

 gank

Subtlety  Scam  Evoke 
Murktide Regent ......

Consider & Expressive Iteration 
Counterspell + Spell Pierce + Force of NegationQQ

{% asset_img Mishras-Bauble.jpg "Mishra's Bauble" %}

## After Preordain Unbanned in Modern


 Murktide

[8/7 ](https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/august-7-2023-banned-and-restricted-announcement) Preordain  Mind's Desire  modern  legacy

 MH1 & MH2

 one drop cantrip DRC  Orcish Bowmasters Unholy Heat
